**What I changed**
- Brief description of changes

**Why**
- Reason / motivation

**Checklist**
- [ ] Tests pass locally (`npm test`)
- [ ] No high severity `npm audit` findings remain
- [ ] Secrets/Deploy notes updated (if applicable)
- [ ] Added migration/rollback notes (if DB changes)

**For dependency PRs**
- If `package.json` contains `overrides`, CI will run a check and may block merges; use the `Auto Bump Dependencies` workflow or follow the Dependency management section in `DEPLOYMENT.md`.
